magicbook.gtlitecore.client.utils

类 IconLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • magicbook.gtlitecore.client.utils.IconLoader

  • public class IconLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    A convenience class for loading icons from images.

    Icons loaded from this class are formatted to fit within the required dimension (16x16, 32x32, or 128x128). If the source image is larger than the target dimension, it is shrunk down to the minimum size that will fit. If it is smaller, then it is only scaled up if the new scale can be a per-pixel linear scale (i.e., x2, x3, x4, etc.). In both cases, the image's width/height ratio is kept the same as the source image.

    作者:
    Chris Molini

    • 方法详细资料

      • setCustomIcon

        public static boolean setCustomIcon(java.lang.String resourcePath)
        Get an icon texture from resourcePath.
        参数:
        resourcePath - Path to the resource.
        返回:
        Returns true if it sets the icon of the display.

      • load

        public static java.nio.ByteBuffer[] load(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Loads the icon in ByteBuffer form.
        参数:
        image - Buffered image.
        返回:
        An array of ByteBuffers containing the pixel data for the icon in various sizes (as recommended by the OS).

      • convertToByteBuffer

        public static java.nio.ByteBuffer convertToByteBuffer(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Converts a BufferedImage into a ByteBuffer of pixel data.
        参数:
        image - The image to convert.
        返回:
        A ByteBuffer that contains the pixel data of the supplied image.
